overview:
Trickvilla provides hidden tweaks and tricks for mobiles, windows, internet, facebook, system, security, tech news and photoshop.

Trickvilla showcases tutorials for Adobe photoshop that help the users to edit images more efficiently.

The blog has legal tweaks and codes for mobile phones like Nokia, Samsung & Apple. Trickvilla is helping users avoid Facebook spam while providing updates and tweaks for Facebook too.

Windows tweaks like ‘how to view command prompt in fullscreen on Win 7’ also find a place in the blog.
